TextView.android:text: Zero-in your enemies and win the thrilling last man standing game - PUBG. To win, you’ll have to remain alert at all times and trust your instincts. During your explorations in the game maps, experiment with different weapons. Scavenge a looted village to find items and use them to your advantage. That’s not all. With airdrops, get a tactical advantage over others with better arsenal and medical kits.
